content: **materials hot cakes ** 2 - 200g cakes plus 1 - 100g ball of encore worsted shown in hot cakes color 11 sugar plum + encore worsted color 702 **size ** approx 32 x 32 **needles ** 24 circulars size 7 & 8 needles 24 circulars **gauge ** 16 sts = 4 in garter stitch on size us 8 or size necessary to obtain given gauge
